summary: July 4 is the 185th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
July 4 is the 185th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar. There are 180 days remaining until the end of the year.
The Aphelion, the point in the year when the Earth is farthest from the Sun, occurs around this date.
title: July 4
